name: Soul Bound (Wolf-Byte)
description:
Soul Bound is an arcade game where you can link with anything you want and spin around it to destroy your enemies and score points!

Video game originally created for the gamejam: "Tu juego a juicio Jam"

Use right click to link into anything and press space to rotate around it, your link destroys your enemies and absorbs their souls.

Use left click to create an explosion to move everything else.

Collect as many souls as you can and link to the staff to deposit them and earn points.

Watch out for the skeletons! They will go for the staff, breaking your link and stealing your valuable points. Hit them!

-PROGRAMMING-
Ismael Valiente Maldonado

-3D ART-
KayKit, Synty Studios (Skybox)

-PARTICLES-
Jean Moreno (Cartoon FX)

-MUSIC-
Muzstation Game Music (Mystical Loop, Funny Horror)

-SOUND EFFECTS-
Sonniss.com, Open Game Art, Kenny, Youtube

¿Todavía estás ahí? ¡Juega ya!
